title: Frank AlpenCoin
author: Frank AlpenCoin
created_time: December 07, 2022, 09:27:57 PMLast edit: December 09, 2022, 09:04:45 PM by Frank AlpenCoin
content: 48H Auction for an "Alpen Coin Christmas Edition 2022 Box"The box contains 24 Orange pillers, each coin is loaded with 10k sats. This box is in Wood, and a 1 of 1. The box will be sealed with holograms.Total Value: 240'000 Satoshi or 0.0024 BTCThe box measures: 21.5 cm x 32.0 cm x  4.0 cm The coins have a diameter of 39 mm and are in ceramic.STARTING BID: .0000 BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: .0001 BTCEND TIME: DECEMBER 9th, 2022, 22:00 GENEVA TIMEPayment due in BTC within 24 hours of auction end. I will send the winner the payment addressSNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.SHIPPING: 30 CHF with tracking anywhere in the US and worldwide                  20 CHF with tracking in the EU                   7 CHF with tracking in Switzerland  (this cost could change)Escrow allowed, winner pays fees.Thank you and good luck
